TopicTitle: So I have had a lot of trouble landing on moons/planets without atmospheres.

Articles.Content:
I've watched countless videos and I have no trouble landing on planets/Laythe with atmospheres but landing on things without atmospheres is really hard. I can get to the planet, I can get down pretty far, but When I'm descending (at 5 m /s) I always fall over and explode! So someone please help me know how to land.

-BatmanJack

Fellow Kerbonaut

Make sure you land on a flat surface and try to get your retrograde marker pointing straight up. Making your landers so that they are wide and have a low center of mass (close to the ground) also works.

Hope this helped.
